law.text: When any action is instituted on behalf of the Energy and Environment Cabinet, the county and Commonwealth's attorney shall represent it in the county in which the action is brought. The Attorney General shall have supervisory authority over all actions instituted for or against the cabinet.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 147, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. III, sec. 13(3). -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2007i-25.
